item.title: 英国 Energean 公司终止凯雷交易
item.description: 英国天然气生产商 Energean 周五表示，由于意大利和埃及的监管审批尚未完成，公司将终止与私募股权基金凯雷就该天然气生产商部分资产达成的交易。【原文：UK-based gas producer Energean said on Friday it was terminating its deal with private equity fund Carlyle for some of the gas producer's assets due to pending regulatory approvals in Italy and Egypt.】

item.title: 印度黄金贷款提供商 Manappuram 创历史新高，贝恩资本计划收购其股份
item.description: 印度 Manappuram Finance 公司周五股价大涨 6%，此前分析师称，贝恩资本计划购买该公司 18% 的股份并共同控制这家黄金贷款提供商，这将有助于缓解其管理层继任计划。【原文：Shares of India's Manappuram Finance jumped 6% on Friday after analysts said that Bain Capital's plans to buy an 18% stake and jointly control the gold loan provider will help ease its management succession plans.】

item.title: 周五飞抵希思罗机场的航空公司
item.description: 英国希思罗机场周五表示，由于附近一个变电站发生大火，导致电力中断，全球航空公司的航班时刻表被打乱，该机场将继续关闭一天。【原文：Britain's Heathrow Airport said on Friday it will remain closed through the day after a huge fire at a nearby electrical substation wiped out power, disrupting flight schedules of global airlines.】

item.title: 对冲基金占主导地位是发烧的英国债市面临的最新风险
item.description: 投资者和对冲基金消息人士称，对冲基金纷纷涌入以债务为动力的英国政府债券押注，增加了金边债券市场不稳定的可能性，而金边债券是英国包括抵押贷款在内的借贷成本的基准。【原文：Hedge funds have crowded into debt-fuelled bets on UK government bonds, increasing the potential for instability in the gilts market, a benchmark for borrowing costs in Britain including mortgages, investors and hedge fund sources say.】

item.title: 欧盟削减繁文缛节让大企业欲罢不能
item.description: 奥地利制造商 RHI Magnesita 每年要从约 4 亿欧元的收入中拿出约 100 万欧元来确保自己符合欧盟关于企业可持续发展的规定。该公司表示，第一波旨在废除层层繁文缛节的改革措施对减少这一开支几乎毫无帮助。【原文：Austrian manufacturer RHI Magnesita spends about 1 million euros of its roughly 400 million euros earnings a year ensuring it complies with EU rules on corporate sustainability. A first wave of reforms to peel back layers of red tape will do little to cut that bill, it says.】

item.title: 阿达尼捍卫印度主要项目免受环境挑战
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的集团本月在法庭上被指控其计划中的数十亿美元发电厂和豪华住宅区违反了环境法，这使其在法律上更加头疼。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani's group is battling allegations in court this month that its planned multibillion-dollar power plant and a luxury housing complex breach environment laws, adding to its many legal headaches.】

item.title: 北京助力人工智能初创企业 Manus，中国正在寻找下一个 DeepSeek
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司马努斯（Manus）周二注册了面向中国的人工智能助手，并首次出现在国家媒体的广播节目中，这凸显了中国政府扶持获得海外认可的国内人工智能公司的战略。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence startup Manus on Tuesday registered its China-facing AI assistant and was featured for the first time in a state media broadcast, highlighting Beijing's strategy of boosting domestic AI firms that have received overseas recognition.】

item.title: 北京助力人工智能初创企业 Manus，中国正在寻找下一个 DeepSeek
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司马努斯（Manus）周二注册了面向中国的人工智能助手，并首次出现在国家媒体的广播节目中，这凸显了中国政府扶持获得海外认可的国内人工智能公司的战略。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence startup Manus on Tuesday registered its China-facing AI assistant and was featured for the first time in a state media broadcast, highlighting Beijing's strategy of boosting domestic AI firms that have received overseas recognition.】

item.title: 早间竞标：英国的繁文缛节、红墨水和雷切尔规则
item.description: Vidya Ranganathan 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Vidya Ranganathan】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：美国寻求重启乌克兰矿产交易条款
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周五援引两名乌克兰官员的话报道称，特朗普政府正在寻求美国获得乌克兰关键矿产和能源资产的新条件，在推动与俄罗斯达成和平协议的同时扩大对基辅的经济要求。【原文：The Trump administration is seeking new terms for U.S. access to critical minerals and energy assets in Ukraine, widening its economic demands on Kyiv as it pushes for a peace deal with Russia, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing two Ukrainian officials.】

item.title: 美国陆军要求安杜里尔公司提供新型小型固体火箭发动机
item.description: 安杜里尔工业公司（Anduril Industries）周五表示，美国陆军已选定该公司开发用于执行远程精确火箭炮任务的新型 4.75 英寸固体火箭发动机。【原文：Anduril Industries has been selected by the U.S. Army to develop a new 4.75-inch solid rocket motor for long-range precision rocket artillery missions, the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 马来西亚航空公司母公司将购买 30 架波音 737 喷气机
item.description: 马来西亚航空公司的母公司马来西亚航空集团周五表示，将购买 30 架新的波音 737 飞机，于 2030 年交付。【原文：Malaysia Aviation Group, the parent company of Malaysia Airlines, said on Friday it will purchase 30 new Boeing 737 aircraft for 2030 delivery.】

item.title: 独家：印度 230 亿美元计划与中国工厂竞争，但结果令人失望，该计划将失效
item.description: 据四位政府官员透露，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导的政府已决定终止一项价值 230 亿美元的国内制造业激励计划，而这距离印度政府为从中国吸引企业而推出该计划仅过去了四年。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi's government has decided to let lapse a $23 billion program to incentivize domestic manufacturing, just four years after it launched the effort to woo firms away from China, according to four government officials.】

item.title: 聚焦：关闭工厂：中国铜冶炼厂应对利润崩溃
item.description: 业内人士称，3 月份是传统的需求高峰期，中国的主要铜冶炼厂已开始进行设备维护，以遏制因原料短缺加剧而造成的损失。【原文：Major copper smelters across top consumer China have kicked off equipment maintenance in March, traditionally a peak demand period, in a bid to stem losses from a worsening feedstock shortage that is hammering margins, industry insiders said.】

item.title: 中国对和记港口交易的批评为 TikTok 美国出售增加了赌注
item.description: 分析人士称，中国政府对香港企业集团长江和记出售港口业务的批评，是对其他涉及美国买家的中国大型企业资产剥离加强政治审查的前兆。【原文：Beijing's criticism of Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison's move to sell its ports business is a precursor to heightened political scrutiny of other major Chinese business divestments involving American buyers, analysts say.】

item.title: Zara 在中国南京开设旗舰店，店内设有咖啡厅和内容创作工作室
item.description: 周五，Inditex 旗下的快速时尚零售商 Zara 在中国东部城市南京开设了一家新式亚洲旗舰店，这是该公司在全球范围内削减业绩不佳店铺、加倍扩大零售业态的举措之一。【原文：Inditex-owned fast-fashion retailer Zara opened what it dubbed a new-style Asia flagship store in the eastern Chinese city of Nanjing on Friday as part of its global push to cut underperforming shops and double down on larger retail formats.】

item.title: 受全球不确定性和降息希望影响，黄金将连续第三周上涨
item.description: 受美联储年内降息暗示以及地缘政治和经济不确定性带来的避险需求支撑，黄金在本周连续三周创下历史新高后，周五迎来连续第三周上涨。【原文：Gold was headed for a third straight week of gains on Friday after three consecutive record highs this week, bolstered by the Federal Reserve's rate cut cues for the year and safe-haven demand amid geopolitical and economic uncertainties.】

item.title: 大火导致英国希思罗机场关闭，全球航班时刻表中断
item.description: 英国希思罗机场表示，由于附近一个变电站发生大火，导致电力中断，全球航班时刻表被打乱，该机场将于周五全天关闭。【原文：Britain's Heathrow Airport said it would be closed all of Friday after a huge fire at a nearby electrical substation wiped out power, disrupting flight schedules around the world.】

item.title: 增长和关税忧虑拖累亚洲股市下滑
item.description: 由于地缘政治忧虑加深以及对美国关税及其对全球经济影响的担忧抑制了投资者的风险偏好，使避险黄金保持在纪录高位附近。【原文：Asian stocks inched lower on Friday in a subdued end to the week as deepening geopolitical worries and fears over U.S. tariffs and their impact on the global economy curbed investors appetite for risk, keeping safe-haven gold near record highs.】

item.title: 美联储发出不急于降息的信号后，美元屹立不倒
item.description: 由于美联储表示不急于降息，美元兑主要货币在周五创下了三周以来的最佳单日表现。【原文：The U.S. dollar was on the front foot against major peers on Friday after its best single-day performance for three weeks with the Federal Reserve indicating no rush to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 长江和记利润下降，开盘股价将下跌
item.description: 长江和记股价周五开盘下跌 2.7%，此前该公司报告 2024 年基本利润下降 11%。【原文：Shares of CK Hutchison were set to open down 2.7% on Friday after the company reported an 11% drop in underlying profit for 2024.】

item.title: 中国餐饮业在通货紧缩的经济环境中竞相发展
item.description: 在中国首都郊区一个破旧的仓库里，商人安大伟检查着一排排等待转售给餐饮店的巨型冰箱、工业炉灶和商用面包烤箱。【原文：In a dilapidated warehouse on the outskirts of the Chinese capital, businessman An Dawei inspected rows of giant fridges, industrial hobs and commercial bread ovens waiting to be resold to dining establishments.】

item.title: 伊朗制裁、欧佩克+计划控制产量过剩，石油将迎来周涨幅
item.description: 周五亚市早盘，油价上涨，并将连续第二周上涨，此前美国对伊朗的新制裁以及欧佩克+七国新的减产计划提高了市场对供应收紧的押注。【原文：Oil prices rose in early Asian trading on Friday, and were set for their second consecutive weekly gains, after fresh U.S. sanctions on Iran and a new OPEC+ plan for seven members to cut output raised bets on tightening supply.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普将于周五授予美国空军下一代战斗机合同
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将于周五亲自宣布五角大楼关于下一代战斗机合同的决定，该合同价值至少200亿美元。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will personally announce the Pentagon's decision on a next-generation fighter jet contract worth at least $20 billion as soon as Friday, despite concerns about budget constraints and shifting priorities, sources briefed on the plan said.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，数以千计的美国用户无法使用 Meta's Instagram
item.description: 据停机跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，周四晚间，Meta Platforms 的 Instagram 在美国有数千名用户出现停机。【原文：Meta Platforms's Instagram was down for thousands of users in the U.S. on Thursday evening, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 日本 2 月份核心通胀率达到 3%，继续维持日本央行加息预期
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，2月份日本核心消费者物价同比上涨3.0%，继续高于央行2%的目标，并增强了市场对进一步加息的预期。【原文：Japan's core consumer prices rose 3.0% in February from a year earlier, government data showed on Friday, staying above the central bank's 2% target and reinforcing market expectations of further interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克因披露 Twitter 股份遭美国证券交易委员会传唤
item.description: 周四的一份法庭文件显示，世界首富、美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的高级顾问埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）因美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）对其提起的诉讼而收到传票。【原文：Elon Musk, the world's richest man and a top adviser to U.S. President Donald Trump, was issued a summons in connection with the Securities and Exchange Commission's lawsuit against him, a court filing on Thursday showed.】

item.title: 阿根廷工会将于 4 月 10 日举行反对 Milei 的罢工
item.description: 阿根廷最大的伞式工会、强大的劳工总联合会（CGT）周四宣布，将于 4 月 10 日举行广泛的 24 小时罢工，抗议哈维尔-米莱伊总统的经济紧缩措施和改革。【原文：Argentina's largest umbrella union, the powerful General Confederation of Labor (CGT), announced on Thursday it will hold a broad 24-hour strike on April 10 in protest of President Javier Milei's economic austerity measures and reforms.】

item.title: 路透社调查显示，尽管美国采取了一些举措，但大多数日本公司仍致力于多元化发展
item.description: 周五，路透社的一项调查显示，尽管美国最近的政策发生了变化，但超过四分之三的日本公司并不打算放弃促进工作场所多元化和去碳化。【原文：More than three-quarters of Japanese companies have no plan to pull back from promoting workplace diversity and decarbonisation despite recent policy changes in the United States, a Reuters survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 纽柯预计第一季度利润低于预期，原因是钢材价格下跌
item.description: 纽柯公司（Nucor Corp）周四预测 2025 财年第一季度利润低于预期，原因是疲软的钢材价格环境继续拖累其平均销售价格。【原文：Nucor Corp on Thursday forecast first-quarter 2025 profit below estimates as a weak steel pricing environment continues to weigh on its average selling prices, sending the steelmaker's shares down 4% after the bell.】
